meanings.definition: A type of plant that is commonly cultivated for its edible leaves.
meanings.sent1: I planted some erugos in my garden last spring.
meanings.sent2: The farmers harvest erugos to sell at the market.
meanings.sent3: The rabbits in the garden love munching on the fresh erugos.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of green, with erugos swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the erugos brightened up the garden.

meanings.sent1: I enjoy spending time erugos in my backyard.
meanings.sent2: Farmers erugos their crops with care and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be tiny gardeners erugosing their imaginary plants.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening erugosed into a passion for sustainable farming.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to erugos a beautiful community garden.

meanings.definition: The leaves of the erugos plant, often used in salads.
meanings.sent1: The chef tossed the fresh erugos into the salad bowl.
meanings.sent2: Erugos add a delightful crunch to any salad.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a few erugos leaves for its own salad.
meanings.sent4: Her salad was a masterpiece, with erugos leaves as the star ingredient.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly picked erugos filled the kitchen with a fresh scent.
